title: Spiced pork chops with green beans and tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '4 boneless pork chops', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or more to taste', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '450g fresh green beans, trimmed', '2 large tomatoes, chopped or 1 (400g) tin of chopped tomatoes', '120ml chicken stock']
